solution_line_template: In seven years, Talia will be {talia_future_age} years old, and therefore Talia is currently {talia_future_age}-{years_to_future}=<<{talia_future_age}-{years_to_future}={talia_current_age}>>{talia_current_age} years old.
Talia's mom is currently three times as old as Talia is today, or {mom_age_multiplier}*{talia_current_age}=<<{mom_age_multiplier}*{talia_current_age}={mom_current_age}>>{mom_current_age} years old.

If in three years, Talia's father will be the same age as Talia's mom is today, then Talia's father is currently {mom_current_age}-{father_years_to_future}=<<{mom_current_age}-{father_years_to_future}={father_current_age}>>{father_current_age} years old.
